settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: System configuration and preferences
settings.description: Configure system parameters and measurement units
settings.unitNamePlaceholder: e.g., Degrees Celsius, Milligrams per liter
settings.unitRequired: Unit name and abbreviation are required
settings.deleteParamConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}}?
settings.deleteParamWarning: This action cannot be undone and will fail if the parameter is currently in use.
settings.deleteUnitConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}} ({{abbreviation}})?
settings.deleteUnitWarning: This action cannot be undone and will fail if the unit is currently in use.
settings.parametersSubtitle: Manage measurement parameters for monitoring points
settings.unitsSubtitle: Manage measurement units for monitoring points
settings.noParameters: No parameters found. Add your first parameter to get started.
settings.noUnits: No units found. Add your first unit to get started.
